summary: This bill, the Federal-State Partnership for Intercity Passenger Rail Reauthorization Act, amends Title 49 of the United States Code to authorize appropriations for the Federal-State partnership for intercity passenger rail grant program. It authorizes $7.5 billion for each fiscal year from 2027 through 2031 to be used for grants. The Secretary is permitted to use up to 2% of appropriated funds for project management oversight. The bill aims to support and fund intercity passenger rail projects through 2031.
